author: bfoster
msg: - pushpull can now limit number of concurrent file downloading sessions on a site per site bases

author: hwright
msg: Since we now use the lighter SAVEPOINT mechanism for WC-NG txns, we can replace
a use of svn_sqlite__with_lock() with our standard wc_db txn handling.
(cache_props_recursive): Use the provided wcroot and local_relpath.
(svn_wc__db_read_props_streamily): Use a wc_db txn instead of an sqlite

author: jitendra
msg: HDFS-1755. Federation: The BPOfferService must always connect to namenode as the login user. Contributed by jitendra.
